text: First the guy let a regular customer order before me, after he asked me to wait a minute. Then the girl was crabby, didn't read my order when she made my pizza then when i asked for the Bacon that I paid for she rudely told me it doesn't …More

name: Justin Indelicato
text: Store is closed don’t waste your time. They need to update their info. There is a sign in the door saying 50% at the Jenison or Kentwood location

text: Love this place. Gluten free pizza is real good

name: Judy Mcpheron
text: Helpful, friendly, efficient service. Always good quality fresh ingredients. I always call ahead or order online, have my order ready for cashier as well as coupon and reward card which really speeds it along.

text: One of my favorite pizzas in town. I love the "Cowboy"

text: Always good service. Pizza always good

name: Anaxagores Elpis
text: The service is friendly and very quick. The pizza is delicious and they have toppings there I can't get anywhere else like sun dried tomatoes and roasted garlic. The pizza cooks well in the oven and I never have to worry about it being over or under done, arriving late or cold.

name: Henry Giles
text: I ordered a family cowboy pizza , it was ok but I would prefer that the toppings we're spread over the whole pizza reather then just dumped on one side & center .

name: seebies
text: Service is great and their pizza is nothing short of fantastic!! Definitely recommend the cowboy and gormet veggie pizza!

text: I love Papa Murphy's, the pizza is made before your eyes and you go home and put it in the oven when your ready.. It doesn't get any better than that!
